Title: All the Wisdom I Got Left
Writer: Jonathan Tropper (created by), David Schickler (created by), Chris Kelley
Actors: Antony Starr, Ivana Milicevic, Ulrich Thomsen, Frankie Faison
Plot: Hood and Brock track down Chayton to Louisiana. Rebecca makes new enemies for her uncle. Colonel Stowe prepares his revenge for the robbery at the base.
